main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported over Fort Monmouth, New Jersey between March 6, 1954 and March 26, 1958, including radar detections and eyewitness accounts.
interesting points: The first sighting involved a fast-moving object detected on radar at 4500 ft increasing in altitude and azimuth., A metallic disk-like object was observed moving erratically across the sky in 1958., The object observed in the 1958 report reflected sunlight and was reported as disk-shaped., An eyewitness described a 20 x 30 oblong object hovering at 500 feet before moving away at high speed., Weather conditions during sightings were mostly clear with scattered clouds.
sighted object: UFOs seen on radar and by multiple witnesses
witness description: One radar observer and one eyewitness (a woman driving).
